name: Angelo Leone
biography: Leone exhibited works at numerous international exhibitions, including the Dublin (1865), Vienna and London (1873), Paris (1878), and the Tennessee Centennial Exposition of 1897. A travel guide book of 1903 advised visitors to Catania to purchase “terracotta figures of Sicilian peasants” from Angelo Leone at Corso Vitt. Emanuele 112. (Southern Italy and Sicily: With Excursions to the Lipari Islands, Malta, Sardinia, Tunis and Corfu. Leipzig: K. Baedeker, 1903.)
